venue.name: Goff Brook Lane, Great Meadows Trust

item.description:
This is the schedule for the Great Meadows Conservation Trust winter walks for 2012, co-sponsored with the Connecticut Audubon Society Center at Glastonbury and the Eleanor Buck Wolf Nature Center in Wethersfield.

 

about two hours.  Meet at 78 Goff Brook La, off of Old Main St.  Join Larry Lunden on a long hike to several of our Hayes parcels in the Rocky Hill Meadows.  From I-91, take exit 24, Wethersfield, Rocky Hill, Silas Deane Highway, route 99 south. Take the Silas Deane a short distance to the second traffic light past the interchange. Turn left onto Marshall Rd and follow it to the end. Turn left onto Old Main St, and take the first right onto Goff Brook La. Meet just past the railroad crossing.

 

Walks will last 2 to 3 hours.  Dress for the Weather and ground conditions.  Many places will be muddy. Weather and water conditions may revise or cancel. Call the CT Audubon Society for the latest information, 860-633-8402.  Free.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Brisk Winter Walk, Rocky Hill Hayes parcels
